Trade/Device Name(s): GAL-1E Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
GAL-1E Multi Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GAL-1E and GAL-1E Multi blood glucose monitoring systems for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, or palm; GAL-1E system for lay use by individual patients; GAL-1E Multi system for multiple patients in clinical settings by healthcare professionals; not indicated for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
